resources.name: Healthcheck
List all drones
resources.description: Return a list of all drones registered in the system.

resources.name: Check available drones (empty)
resources.description:
Return a list of drones in state IDLE.

```json
{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "serial_number": "q23q2r3232dd3r",
      "model": "lightweight",
      "weight_limit": 2,
      "battery": 20,
      "state": "idle",
      "created_at": "2021-12-04T16:49:29.000Z",
      "updated_at": "2021-12-05T06:52:32.345Z"
    },
    {
      "id": 3,
      "serial_number": "2VBAGM9KAVQU54",
      "model": "lightweight",
      "weight_limit": 500,
      "battery": 50,
      "state": "idle",
      "created_at": "2021-12-05T10:17:38.685Z",
      "updated_at": "2021-12-05T10:17:38.685Z"
    }
  ]
}
```

resources.name: Check available drones (loading)
resources.description:
Return a list of drones in state loading. This allows you continue loading this drones until full cargo capacity.

Sample:
```json
{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 2,
      "serial_number": "2RICRPCUA43G5D",
      "model": "cruiserweight",
      "weight_limit": 550,
      "battery": 100,
      "state": "loading",
      "created_at": "2021-12-05T10:14:11.653Z",
      "updated_at": "2021-12-05T10:22:50.402Z"
    }
  ]
}
```

resources.name: Bad call to check available drones
Register a drone
resources.description:
Creates a new drone. Response the created object.

```json
{
  "data": {
    "id": 9,
    "serial_number": "AABBCCDD6",
    "model": "cruiserweight",
    "weight_limit": 520,
    "battery": 100,
    "state": "idle",
    "created_at": "2021-12-05T11:43:38.108Z",
    "updated_at": "2021-12-05T11:43:38.108Z"
  }
}
```

resources.name: Unregister a drone
resources.description:
Return a list of drones in state IDLE.
If successfull, returns empty content with http status code 204.

resources.name: Check drone battery level
